competitors.name: Macromedia
competitors.notes: Primary competitor until Adobe acquired it in 2005 for $3.5 billion. Known for Flash, Dreamweaver, and Fireworks

competitors.name: Autodesk
competitors.notes: Long-standing competitor with products for architecture, engineering, construction, media & entertainment, and manufacturing

competitors.name: Microsoft
competitors.notes: Competitor in business/creative software with Office suite

competitors.name: Google
competitors.notes: Emerging competitor in analytics and web-based tools. Google Analytics competes with Adobe Analytics

competitors.name: Corel Corporation
competitors.notes: Competitor in graphics and design software

competitors.name: Salesforce
competitors.notes: Competitor in enterprise software and CRM space

competitors.name: Oracle
competitors.notes: Competitor in enterprise software and database solutions

context: Adobe Inc. is a creative software and digital experience company focused on creative tools, document management, and digital marketing solutions. Acquired Macromedia for $3.4B, gaining Flash, Dreamweaver, and web development tools.
